bibl.title: Alexandria's Via Canopica: Political Expression and Urban Topography from Augustus to 'Amr Ibn al-'As. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The multi-faceted nature of the Via Canopica's social function, at once a via sacra, a via triumphalis, and a via dolorosa.

bibl.title: Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud

bibl.seg: HAAS Christopher, Alexandria's Via Canopica: Political Expression and Urban Topography from Augustus to 'Amr Ibn al-'As. Avec résumé en anglais.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud = BSAA 45 (1993) pp. 123-138.
The multi-faceted nature of the Via Canopica's social function, at once a via sacra, a via triumphalis, and a via dolorosa.
